title: Ukrainian military had 50 combat engagements with Russian forces near Stara Huta and Brusky of Sumy region, Bilohorivka of Lu...
content: Ukrainian military had 50 combat engagements with Russian forces near Stara Huta and Brusky of Sumy region, Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Ivanivske, Klischiyivka and south to Chasiv Yar of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Tonenke, Pervomayske and Nevelske of Donetsk region, Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka of Donetsk region, near Robotyne and north-west Verbove of Zaporizhzhia region, at the eastern bank of Dnipro river in Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
